page.title: 19Football
page.content: My day at a football match was on Saturday morning at 10 o'clock at Glascote.It was a five aside knockout tournament.There was about 20 teams.The players in my team were Daniel,Mark, Matthew,Stuart and me.We got on the pitch about 10.15a.m.We played against Glascote Heath and won 4-0.Daniel scored 2 and I scored 2,it was an ace match.Then we played Harlaston,we won 6-3.Stuart scored 1 Daniel scored 1 and I scored 4.Then in the final we played against the holders Drayton Basset it was brilliant.We won 3-1 Stuart scored 1 Mark scored 1 and I scored 1.We had won the cup for the very first time.I enjoyed myself at the match we had a great time.
